translations: （尤指为获取秘密情报而）渗透，渗入（组织、场所等）；（肿瘤、细胞等）浸润（组织，器官）；（液体）渗入；（某种特性缓慢地）透入，渗透

sentences.sentence: Troops repelled an attempt to infiltrate the south of the island.
sentences.translation: 部队挫败了对该岛南部的渗透企图。

sentences.sentence: He claimed that some countries have been trying to infiltrate their agents into the republic.
sentences.translation: 他声称有些国家一直试图使他们的特工渗入该共和国。

sentences.sentence: Why did LOL infiltrate the language?
sentences.translation: LOL为什么能渗入语言之中？
